name: DARK'N STORMY
instructions: Pour ginger beer into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Float rum on top.

name: VESPER
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled Champagne or cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.
Serve in a Champagne Flute.

name: BLUE HAWAIIAN
instructions: Combine ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in blender on high speed. Pour into chilled highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.
Serve in a Highball Glass.

name: WIKI WAKI WOO
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Pour, with ice, into hurricane or parfait glass. Add orange and cherry.

name: THE DEEP BLUE SEA

name: CHI CHI

instructions: Shake with ice and pour into chilled Collins glass. Garnish with mint.

name: GIN SMASH

instructions: Muddle mint and sugar cube in old-fashioned glass. Add soda water and mix to dissolve sugar. Add gin and ice and stir. Garnish with orange wheel and/or cherry and the lemon twist.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: FISH HOUSE PUNCH
ingredients: 1 Pint(s) Cold strong brewed black tea (optional)
instructions: Stir in punch bowl. Add large block of ice. Garnish with fruit. Serve in punch cups

name: FISH HOUSE PUNCH
ingredients: 1 1/2 Quart(s) Old Mr. Boston Five Star Brandy
1 Part(s) Old Mr. Boston Peach Flavored Brandy
1 Part(s) Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum
instructions: Juice of 1 Dozen Lemons Add enough Powdered Sugar to sweeten. Place large block of ice in punch bowl and stir well. Then add: 1 1/2 qts. Old Mr. Boston Five Star Brandy 1 pt. Old Mr. Boston Peach Flavored Brandy 1 pt. Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum 1 qt. Carbonated Water Some prefer to add the strained contents of a pot of tea. Stir well and decorate with fruits in season. Serve in 4 oz. Punch glasses.
Serve in a Punch Cup.

name: GIN SMASH
ingredients: 2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
instructions: Muddle one lump of sugar with 1 oz. carbonated water and 4 sprigs of mint, and add 2 oz. Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin and an ice cube. Stir in an old-fashioned glass and decorate with a slice of orange and a cherry. Add a twist of lemon peel.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: FISH HOUSE PUNCH
ingredients: 1 1/2 Quart(s) Old Mr. Boston Five Star Brandy
1 Part(s) Old Mr. Boston Peach Flavored Brandy
instructions: Juice 1 dozen Lemons. Add enough powdered sugar to sweeten. Pour over large block of ice in punch bowl and stir well. Then add: 1 1/2 qts. Old Mr. Boston Five Star Brandy 1 pt. Old Mr. Boston Peach Flavored Brandy 1 pt. Old Mr. Boston Rum 1 qt. Carbonated Water 1 pt. Strong Tea (optional) Stir well and decorate with fruits in season. Serve in punch glasses.
Serve in a Punch Cup.

instructions: Shake without ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with skewered pineapple, cherry, and mint.

1 Part(s) Old Mr. Boston Peach Flavored Brandy
1 Part(s) Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum
instructions: Juice of 1 Dozen Lemons Add enough Powdered Sugar to sweeten. Place large block of ice in punch bowl and stir well. Then add: 1 1/2 qts. Old Mr. Boston Five Star Brandy 1 pt. Old Mr. Boston Peach Flavored Brandy 1 pt. Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum 1 qt. Carbonated Water Some prefer to add the strained contents of a pot of tea. Stir well and decorate with fruits in season. Serve in 4 oz. Punch glasses.
Serve in a Punch Cup.

name: ANGEL FACE
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into cocktail glass.
Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: SWEET-TART
instructions: Process ingredients in blender with 1 cup crushed ice until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass. Garnish with lime.
Serve in a Hurricane Glass.

name: LEAP YEAR COCKTAIL
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into 3 oz. Cocktail glass.
Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: MULLED CLARET
instructions: Put all ingredients into a metal mug. heat poker red-hot and hold in liquid until boiling and serve; or warm on a stove.
Serve in a Metal Mug.

name: KNICKERBOCKER SPECIAL COCKTAIL
ingredients: 2/3 17-year-old J. Wray and Nephew Ltd. Rum
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into 4 oz. Cocktail glass.
Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: RUM RELAXER
instructions: Shake first three ingredients with ice and pour with ice into hurricane or parfait glass. Fill glass with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with orange and cherry.
Serve in a Hurricane Glass.

name: SUNSHINE COCKTAIL
ingredients: 1 1/2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
instructions: Stir well with cracked ice and strain into 3 oz. cocktail glass. Twist of orange peel on top and drop into glass.
Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: CONCRETE JUNGLE
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: ZOMBIE
ingredients: 1/2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Apricot Flavored Brandy
2 1/2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum
instructions: Add cracked ice and agitate for full minute in electric mixing machine (if none available, shake very well in cocktail shaker), and strain into 14 oz. frosted zombie glass. Decorate with square of pineapple and 1 green and 1 red cherry. Carefully float 1/2 oz. 151 proof Demerara Rum and then top with sprig of fresh Mint dipped in powdered sugar. Serve with straws.
Serve in a Zombie glass.

name: RUM RUNNER
ingredients: 1 1/2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
instructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: MARTINEZ COCKTAIL
ingredients: 1/4 Teaspoon(s) Old Mr. Boston Triple Sec
1 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with a cherry.
Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: RUM COLLINS
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Add several cubes of ice, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Decorate with slice of lemon and a cherry. Serve with a straw.
Serve in a Collins Glass.

name: BIJOU COCKTAIL
ingredients: 1/3 Glass Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
instructions: Stir well with cracked ice and strain into 3 oz. Cocktail glass. Add Cherry on top.
Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: WEBSTER COCKTAIL
ingredients: 1/4 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Apricot Flavored Brandy
1 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into 3 oz. cocktail glass.

name: RUM RUNNER
ingredients: 1 1/2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
instructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

1 1/2 Teaspoon(s) Old Mr. Boston Triple Sec
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass with its rim moistened with cherry liqueur and dipped into powdered sugar. Add a Maraschino cherry.

ingredients: 2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into 12 oz. Tom Collins glass. Add several cubes of ice, fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slice of lemon and a cherry and drop lime in glass. Serve with straws.

ingredients: 2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum

name: PINA COLADA
instructions: Place in an electric blender with two cups of crushed ice and blend at high speed for a short time. Strain into collins glass and serve with straw.

name: PINK PARADISE
instructions: Stir ingredients in ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

name: SINGAPORE SLING

instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into 12 oz. Tom Collins glass. Add ice cubes and fill with carbonated water; stir. Decorate with fruits in season and serve with straws.

name: M.W. HERON'S EGG NOG
instructions: Combine Southern Comfort and Mr. Boston Egg Nog into a Cocktail Shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick, grated cinnamon, and nutmeg.

name: MAI-TAI
ingredients: 1 Tablespoon(s) Orgeat or Almond Flavored Syrup
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into large old-fashioned glass about 1/3 full with crushed ice. Decorate with a maraschino cherry speared to a wedge of fresh pineapple. For a hair raiser, top with a dash of 151 proof rum; for a true Hawaiian effect float an orchid on each drink. Serve with straws.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: DARK'N STORMY
instructions: Pour ginger beer into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Float rum on top.

name: CHERRY BLOSSOM COCKTAIL

name: BLUE LAGOON

instructions: Use a Metal Mug. Heat poker red hot and hold in liquid until boiling and serve.

unkown Slice(s) orange, lemon, pineapple and a cherry

name: ALLEGHENY

name: CREAM PUFF

Serve in a Cocktail Glass.

name: LAST WORD

instructions: Dissolve 1 Lump of Sugar Add 4 leaves of Green Mint, crushing mint and sugar lightly together. Add jigger of Gin then a cube of ice. Stir and decorate with a slice of Orange and a cherry. Twist Lemon Peel on top. Use Old Fashioned Cocktail glass.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: GIN SMASH
instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint in old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, and decorate with a slice of orange and a cherry. Add a twist of lemon peel.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: WHITE RUSSIAN
instructions: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka in old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and fill with milk or cream.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: WHISKEY FIX
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass. Fill glass with ice. Add 2 1/2 oz. Blended Whiskey. Stir and add a slice of lemon. Serve with straws.
Serve in a Highball Glass.

name: MADRAS
instructions: Pour into highball glass over ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime.
Serve in a Highball Glass.

name: WHISKEY SMASH
instructions: Muddle 1 lump of sugar with 1 oz. Carbonated Water and 4 Sprigs of Green Mint Add 2 oz. Old Mr. Boston Whiskey, then a Cube of Ice Stir and decorate with a slice of orange and a cherry. Twist of lemon peel. Use old fashioned cocktail glass.
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: PINK LADY
instructions: Shake without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into chilled red wine glass.

name: GIN SMASH
instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint in old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, and decorate with a slice of orange and a cherry. Add a twist of lemon peel.

name: CALIFORNIA LEMONADE

Serve in a Collins Glass.

name: TUXEDO COCKTAIL
instructions: Stir well with cracked ice and strain into 3 oz. Cocktail glass. Serve with a cherry.

name: SAZERAC COCKTAIL
ingredients: 2 Ounce(s) Old Mr. Boston Blended Whiskey
instructions: Put 1/4 teaspoon absinthe substitute into old-fashioned glass until it is entirely coated with the liquid. Then add 1/2 lump of sugar, 2 dashes bitters, and sufficient water to cover sugar, and muddle well. Stir in 2 oz. Old Mr. Boston Blended Whiskey and add two ice cubes and a twist of lemon peel. (For best results, put glass on ice for a few minutes before using.)
Serve in an Old-Fashioned Glass.

name: VODKA SOUR
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Decorate with half-slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: MANHATTAN COCKTAIL

name: SAZERAC COCKTAIL
instructions: Put 1/4 Teaspoon Absinthe Substitute into an Old Fashioned cocktail glass and revolve glass until it is entirely coated with the Absinthe Substitute.
